contents.narration:
{ghostWail}
		It's here!
		||
		You have found it.  Now get to work!
		||
		The slinking denizen has spotted you.
You attempt to run!
You fail to run away!

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/footsteps/stairs/stairs_06'/>
		You get away!
<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/camera/camera_04'/> You lift your camera and snap a picture.
The picture is blurry and the spirit cannot be seen.
You snap a clear photo of the spirit. You see now that it is a {ghostType}.
You are out of film.

You force you will against the ghost's. {attackz}
		||

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/aircrafts/futuristic/futuristic_03'/>
		The beam from your enhanced flashlight is causing the ghost to destabilize.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/human/amzn_sfx_laughter_giggle_02
		The ghost shields itself, escaping injury for the moment.
		||
		<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/electrical/buzz_hums/buzz_hums_02'/>
		The ghost blinks in and out of existence.
		||
		<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/human/amzn_sfx_laughter_giggle_02
		The ghost sinks through the floor and appears behind you.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/magic_spells/magic_spells_02'/>
		The ghost is blinded and offended by the holy symbol!
		||
		<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/magic_spells/magic_spells_02'/>
		The ghost seems physically assaulted by your attack.
		||
		<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/magic_spells/magic_spells_02'/>
		You send holy fire through the entity.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/scifi/amzn_sfx_scifi_zap_backwards_01'/><audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/gameshow/gameshow_01'/>
		You have your photo and the spirit is banished.  Nice work! {description}

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/gameshow/gameshow_02'/>
		Although you banished the spirit, you failed to photograph it and thus you lose.  Too Bad!
The ghost can only be seen with your flashlight, so make sure to keep it on!
Snapping a photo of the ghost will reveal what type it is.  Try looking for better film while you are in the house.

parameters.variableValue: A spirit is a lost soul, not particularly dangerous and moderately prone to fleeing.
A shadow will do just that, stalk and follow you until one of you is gone.
Specters are terribly repulsed by light and will stop at nothing to flee from an altercation.
Apparitions are but echoes of their past lives, listlessly wondering forever in limbo.

contents.narration:
<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/horror/horror_06'/>
		A chill runs up your spine as you feel an oppressve wave of cold grip cross over you.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/horror/horror_09'/>
		The spirit dives at you.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/nature/amzn_sfx_earthquake_rumble_01'/>
		The ghost makes physical contact with you, injuring your body.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/electrical/buzz_hums/buzz_hums_02'/>
		The ghost has caused your flashlight to malfunction.

You verily avoid injury by the entity.
		||
		You duck as the entity flies over your head.
		||
		You dodge as the icy cold being darts past you.
You are unable to see the ghost, better think quick!  You can turn on your flashlight or try and flee.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/gameshow/gameshow_02'/>
		You have been killed.
There is no ghost here to photograph.  The picture is useless.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/magic_spells/magic_spells_11'/>
		The ghost is trying to flee!
		||
		The ghost is dematerializing.
Be sure to look around for helpful items, especially film, should you run out!
You may also select a crucifix, a totem, or an incantation as your spiritual weapon. Which do you prefer?

parameters.message: Please choose the crucifix, the totem, or the incantation.

parameters.variableValue: The crucifix works best against those ghost who wish to torment you.
You brandish the crucifix and stand before the entity.
The totem generates its own piercing light.
You extend the ttem in front of you and let its mystical energies shine.
The incantation is spoke with powerful words against those who wander.
You calmly recite the spell and feel the air around you become light and electric.

contents.narration: Excellent choice. {weaponz}
<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/horror/horror_01'/>

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/alarms/beeps_and_bloops/clock_01'/>
		You find a tarnished pocket watch.  Holding it makes you feel as if nothing can escape you.
You found some film for your camera.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/cloth_leather_paper/money_coins/money_coins_05'/>
		You find an ornate ring of a snake carved out of jade.  You place it on your finger and feel your body dematerialize and slip into the void.  The ring is gone.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/cloth_leather_paper/books/books_08'/>
		You find an impossibly old scroll.  The words upon it embue you with power and you see the length of your flashlight glow.
You find a bottle of pills, some kind of organic something.  You kick back a few and feel surprising refreshed.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/electrical/arcs_sparks/arcs_sparks_01'/>
		You find a dazzling ruby pendant on a silver chain.  You place it around your neck and in an instant you dissappear and reappear.
You find a battery that hums with energy.  Popping it into your flashlight causes the beam to shine green.
You found superior film!  This film will make it much easier to photograph the ghost.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/chairs/seats_stools/seats_stools_07'/>
		There is nothing here of interest.
		||
        <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/chairs/seats_stools/seats_stools_07'/>
		You rummage to no avail.
		||
        <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/chairs/seats_stools/seats_stools_07'/>
		Nothing but useless junk here.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/cloth_leather_paper/books/books_08'/>
		The slip of paper is blank.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/horror/horror_04'/>
		You look at the cryptic letters on the page and they start to glow.  Your senses tingle as you sense the location of the spirit.
There is a baton in the vase.  Numerous symbols and sigils have been etched into it.  It feels tremendously light.
You do not have the ability to sense ghosts.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/scifi/amzn_sfx_scifi_radar_high_ping_01'/>
		The ghost is located at the {sense}

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/alarms/beeps_and_bloops/zap_01'/>
			You take a swing with the baton and it shatters the visage of the ghost.

<audio src'soundbank://soundlibrary/alarms/beeps_and_bloops/woosh_02'/>
			You swing the baton and it slices through the air with ease.
You do not have such an item.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/switches_levers/switches_levers_15'/>
		You click the button and your flashlight turns off.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/switches_levers/switches_levers_15'/> 
		You click the button and your flashlight turns on.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/switches_levers/switches_levers_15'/>
		Your flashlight clicks to life.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/horror/horror_12'/>
		It is time for you to rid this place of its uninvited guest!

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/horror/horror_01'/>
		We will start in the foyer at the front of the house.  Move around until you find it, snap its photo, then banish it.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/footsteps/concrete/concrete_08'/>
		This is the living room.  No, it's not called the dead room when ghosts are around. There is a coffee table here.  You can access the foyer and the dining room from here.
The living room connects to the foyer and the dining room.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/horror/horror_01'/>
	It's a dining room, where people eat! A glass curio cabinet is near the back wall. You can access the kitchen and the living room from here.
From the dining room you can reach the kitchen and the living room.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/chairs/seats_stools/seats_stools_05'/>
		This is the foyer. A small table has been placed against the wall. You can access the kitchen, the living room, and the stairs from here.
The foyer leads to the stairs, the living room, and the kitchen.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/animals/amzn_sfx_rat_squeaks_01'/>
		It's a kitchen! There's a carved wooden box on the counter. A slip of paper has been left on the tile floor.  You can go to the foyer or the dining room from here!
The kitchen leads to the foyer and the dining room.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/animals/amzn_sfx_raven_caw_2x_01'/>
		It's a patio, what a nice breeze! There is a wooden chest and a large vase here. You can take the stairs from here.
The patio is connected to the stairs.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/human/amzn_sfx_human_walking_02'/>
		The stairs! There is an old painting of a safe on the wall.   You can go to the patio or the foyer from here.
The stairs lead to the patio and the foyer.

<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/monsters/ghosts_demons/ghosts_demons_12'/>
		||
		<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/monsters/ghosts_demons/ghosts_demons_15'/>
Need a little break, do we?  I will see you when you return.
Thanks for playing. Would you like to start over or take a break?

Here's the help menu. Choose the room you want to search by saying its name.  You can 'check' or 'examine' furniture for special items.  Keep your flashlight on by saying 'use flashlight'.  When you confront the ghost, first 'use camera' to get a clear picture and then attack Picking up where you left off.
Get in there and get that thing! Resume?
